programme.desc: Os novos amigos Josh e Ling visitam seus respectivos pais em uma escavação arqueológica na China, onde descobrirão um mundo fantástico de aventura.

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin: Cavaleiros de Camelot, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: Um Rei Arthur muito mais velho retorna para casa após lutar contra o Império Romano. Seu filho ilegítimo corrompeu o trono de Camelot. Agora o Rei Arthur deve se reunir com o mago Merlin e os Cavaleiros da Távola Redonda e lutar para recuperar sua coroa.

programme.title: As Tartarugas Ninja 3, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: Um cetro mágico leva April para o Japão antigo. As Tartarugas Ninja viajam no tempo para salvá-la, mas Michelangelo se perde. Donatello, Raphael e Leonardo ajudam uma vila contra o malvado Lorde Norinaga.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Samurai X, (2012, Action)
programme.desc: Um ex-assassino que resolveu nunca mais matar tem seu voto duramente testado.

programme.title: Máscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um herói mascarado.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A vingança do dragão, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: O lendário lutador de Muay Thai Tong Po assassina Eric Sloane covardemente em uma luta. O irmão de Eric, Kurt Sloane, que sempre viveu à sua sombra, desencadeia um grande e forte desejo por vingança.

programme.title: Combate, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um jovem lutador deve decidir seu destino; desistir de tudo e treinar para honra e glória ou sucumbir à vida de um lutador de jaula por um mafioso russo.

programme.title: O Vingador Marcial, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de matar um adversário em uma luta clandestina, um campeão de artes marciais e MMA vê sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo quando uma gangue rival, em busca de vingança, mata sua esposa durante um ataque de vingança.

programme.title: Karatê Girl, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: Uma estudante do ensino médio no Japão que é uma estudante de karatê arrogante, mas magistral, torna-se feroz quando se junta a uma equipe disfarçada de lutadores.

programme.title: Retroceder Nunca, Render-se Jamais, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Jason Stillwell é um fã de Bruce Lee e jovem aprendiz de artes marciais. Após seu pai negar participar de uma gangue de criminosos, eles se mudam de cidade, onde Jason encontrará problemas.

programme.title: O Matador - Missão Resgate, (2022, Action)
programme.desc: Quando a garota de quem ele está cuidando é sequestrada, um assassino aposentado rapidamente recupera seus instintos assassinos, incendiando a cidade.

programme.title: Batalha dos Impérios, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: O general romano Lucius lidera uma legião de mil soldados no país e com o comandante do protetorado das Regiões Ocidentais, Huo An, ele luta para derrotar o assassino Tiberius e restaurar a soberania da China.

programme.title: We're No Angels, (1955, Screwball)
programme.desc: Humphrey Bogart plays one of his rare comedy roles in this jaunty excursion about three convicts - Joseph (Bogart), Albert (Aldo Ray) and Jules (Peter Ustinov) - who are plotting their escape from Devil's Island.

programme.title: West Side Story, (1961, Musical)
programme.desc: Winner of ten Academy Awards including Best Picture, this electrifying musical sets the ageless tragedy of 'Romeo and Juliet' in the slums of 1950s New York and stars Natalie Wood, Richard Beymer, Russ Tamblyn, Rita Moreno, and George Chakiris.

programme.title: A Funny Thing Happened on the Way to the Forum, (1966, Music)
programme.desc: Zero Mostel, Buster Keaton, Phil Silvers and an all-star cast scam their way through this boisterous romp amidst gorgeous girls, mistaken identities, stunning surprises, cunning disguises and great Sondheim songs.

programme.title: How to Succeed in Business Without Really Trying, (1967, Musical)
programme.desc: This hilarious musical stars Robert Morse as a charming and scheming window washer who climbs to the top of the corporate ladder by way of a self-help book.

programme.title: The Skull, (1965, Thriller)
programme.desc: The skull of the Marquis de Sade has been taken from its grave, bringing terror to those who own it. Demonologist Christopher Maitland is eager to add the piece to his occult collection.

programme.title: White Zombie, (1932, Zombies)
programme.desc: Watch Bela Lugosi use his special zombie grip to make beautiful women submit to his every desire! In this low budget screamer, a couple honeymooning in Haiti run afoul of a diabolical voodoo master. They're soon wishing they'd gone to Cancun!

programme.title: The Alamo, (1960, War)
programme.desc: John Wayne produces, directs and stars in this retelling of the Alamo, a battle in which 185 men joined together against an army of 7,000. Filmed entirely in Texas, "The Alamo" is a visually stunning and historically accurate celebration of courage.

programme.title: The Vikings, (1958, Thriller)
programme.desc: Legends Kirk Douglas, Tony Curtis, Ernest Borgnine and Janet Leigh dazzle in this epic chronicle of brutal rivalry and bloodthirsty ambition as two brothers are locked in a battle that will decide their fate...and that of a beautiful princess.

programme.title: The Buccaneer, (1958, Action)
programme.desc: General Andrew Jackson's dependence on the help of pirate Jean Lafitte to repel the British is complicated by the Governor's daughter. Set in New Orleans during the War of 1812.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)
programme.desc: In 1965, America is at war with North Vietnam and Lt. Col. Hal Moore prepares his troops for one of the most violent battles in U.S. History: “The Valley of Death”.

programme.title: Top Gun, (1986, Action)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is superb as Maverick Mitchell, a young flyer who's out to become the best. And Kelly McGillis plays the instructor who teaches Maverick a few things you can't learn in a classroom.

programme.title: Point Break, (1991, Action)
programme.desc: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

programme.title: The Last Castle, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: His service to his country made him a hero. One mistake made him a prisoner. For General Eugene Irwin (Redford), It's just a matter of serving out his sentance - until he makes the shocking discovery that his fellow inmates are being murdered.

programme.title: We Were Soldiers, (2002, Action)

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: An obese attorney accidentally runs down and kills an old gypsy woman. After her ancient father puts a curse on him, he starts losing weight, and cannot stop. Based on the Stephen King novel, written under the pseudonym Richard Bachman.

programme.title: Secret Window, (2004, Thriller)
programme.desc: Academy Award® nominee Johnny Depp (2003 Best Actor, Pirates of the Caribbean: The Curse of the Black Pearl) gives his most riveting performance in this action/suspense thriller featuring a top-notch cast.

programme.title: The Dead Zone, (1983, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A man awakens from a coma to discover he has a psychic detective ability.

programme.title: Cujo, (1983, Horror Classics)
programme.desc: While Donna and Vic Trenton struggle to save their rocky marriage, their son Tad befriends the loveable 200-lb St. Bernard who belongs to their mechanic.

programme.title: Stephen King's Silver Bullet, (1985, Werewolves)
programme.desc: Something is killing off townsfolk in Tarker's Mills. Something ingenious. Something remotely human. But the only person in town with courage to stop this lurking menace is a 13-year-old boy, confined to a wheelchair since birth.

programme.title: Pet Sematary, (1989, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: For most families, moving is a new beginning. But for the Creeds, it could be the beginning of the end. Because they've just moved in next door to a place that children built with broken dreams, the Pet Sematary.

programme.title: Stephen King's Graveyard Shift, (1990, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: When a mill is reopened, several employees meet their deaths. The killings all occur between 11 p.m. and 7 a.m. the Graveyard Shift. Soon, the workers find a maze of tunnels leading to the cemetery and the horror that comes alive at night.

programme.title: Stephen King's Thinner, (1996, Supernatural Horror)

programme.desc: Light uses the Death Note to try to get rid of the woman who could get him captured, and is shocked when it doesn't work.

programme.title: Death Note: Encounter
programme.desc: The murders continue, and L grows suspicious of Light's too perfect behavior and decides to investigate him on his own.

programme.title: Death Note: Doubt
programme.desc: L's suspicion of Light deepens, compelling him to invite Light into the investigation.

programme.title: Death Note: Assault
programme.desc: As predicted on the tapes sent to Sakura TV, news anchors and commentators who expressed doubt about Kira die one by one.

programme.title: Death Note: Love
programme.desc: With a second Kira now on the loose, L asks Light to join the task force and pose as the real Kira in order to catch the copycat.

programme.title: Death Note: Confession
programme.desc: Light goes to Aoyama to discover the identity of the second Kira before L becomes more suspicious.

programme.title: Death Note: Friend
programme.desc: Light and Misa show each other their Death Notes, and Light asks Misa to have her shinigami Rem get rid of L.

programme.title: Death Note: Wager
programme.desc: Evidence turns up that points to Misa Amane as the second Kira.

programme.title: Death Note: Decision
programme.desc: Misa is in confinement, though her memories of the Death Note have been completely wiped away.

programme.title: Death Note: Execution
programme.desc: After fifty days of confinement the killings continue, and Misa and Light are released.

programme.title: Death Note: Ally
programme.desc: Though L is still suspicious, Light and Misa, their memories of being Kira wiped clean, return to headquarters .

programme.title: Death Note: Matsuda
programme.desc: Matsuda, the task force member assigned to watch Misa, is eager to distinguish himself.

programme.title: Death Note: Makeshift
programme.desc: L's team discovers that the Yotsuba Group meet in secret to discuss the elimination of individuals who are troublesome to their company .

programme.title: Death Note: Performance
programme.desc: The Yotsuba Group hires Eraldo Coil to uncover L's identity.

programme.title: Death Note: Guidance
programme.desc: Misa succeeds in narrowing down the Kira suspects in the Yotsuba Group to one: Higuchi.

programme.title: Death Note: Frenzy
programme.desc: Higuchi of the Yotsuba Group attempts to kill Matsuda of the task force, and is surprised when he doesn't die after 40 seconds.

programme.title: Death Note: Revival
programme.desc: Higuchi is captured and tells the investigators about the Death Note.

programme.title: Death Note: Silence
programme.desc: Light, his memory recovered, orders Misa to begin killing after Higuchi dies.

programme.title: Death Note: Renewal
programme.desc: Light has removed everyone in his way and is closer to achieving his perfect world.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: An inspirational account of basketball coach Ken Carter, who received both praise and criticism when he made headlines for benching his entire undefeated team for poor academic performance.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Slice, (2018, Werewolves)
programme.desc: In a spooky small town, when a slew of pizza delivery boys are slain on the job, two daring survivors (Atlanta's Zazie Beetz and Chance the Rapper in a wild film debut) set out to catch the culprits behind the cryptic crime spree.

programme.title: RUN, (2025, Thriller)
programme.desc: After leaving her fiancé at the altar, Melissa joins friends at a cabin. When Jenny is found mutilated in the woods and aliens attack the nation, the girls must fight to survive.

programme.title: Coach Carter, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: An inspirational account of basketball coach Ken Carter, who received both praise and criticism when he made headlines for benching his entire undefeated team for poor academic performance.

programme.title: All Styles, (2018, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Brandon, a freshman in college, tries to focus on his studies but keeps coming to the same conclusion, dance is his passion. He assembles a ragtag crew to face off against his former crew and must prove that they have what it takes to make it as dancers.

programme.title: Spell, (2019, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Marquis (Omari Hardwick) awakens from a plane crash, wounded, trapped and his family missing. Held by a mysterious elderly woman practicing Hoodoo, he tries to outwit and break free from her dark magic and save his family from a sinister ritual.

programme.title: Rob-B-Hood, (2007, Action)
programme.desc: Thongs and Octopus grow attached to the baby they kidnapped for their landlord, which leads to complications in handing him over.

programme.title: Little Big Soldier, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: An old soldier captures a young general after a battle in China and takes him on a long journey to collect a reward.

programme.title: Police Story: Lockdown, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: While visiting his estranged daughter at a nightclub, a police captain must spring into action when an elaborate kidnapping plan unravels right before his eyes.

programme.title: Dragon Blade, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Epic sword-and-sandal war thriller starring martial arts legend Jackie Chan starring alongside John Cusack and Adrian Brody.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: Ma Yuan, a railroad worker and his group of freedom fighters find themselves on the wrong side of the tracks when they decide to ambush a heavily armed military train filled with desperately needed provisions.

programme.title: Bleeding Steel, (2017, Action)
programme.desc: In this fantastical action film, martial arts legend Jackie Chan stars as a police inspector tracking down a deranged villain who is out to kidnap his daughter.

programme.title: Hitman [English-Language Version], (1998, Action)
programme.desc: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.

programme.title: The Swordsman, (2020, Action)
programme.desc: After being blinded in a coup against the king, Joseon’s greatest swordsman goes into hiding, far removed from his city’s anguish. But when traffickers kidnap his daughter, he has no choice but to unsheathe his sword once more.

programme.title: Little Man, (2006, Comedy)
programme.desc: A wannabe dad mistakes a vertically challenged criminal on the lam as his newly adopted son.

programme.title: The House Bunny, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Shelley gets kicked out of the mansion, she's lost in the wilds of Beverly Hills until she stumbles upon the sorriest sorority on campus. Now it's up to her to spruce up the girls and heat up the Zeta house before the University shuts them down.

programme.title: Easy A, (2010, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: After a little white lie about losing her virginity gets out, a clean cut high school girl (Emma Stone) sees her reputation tarnished until she decides to use the rumor mill to advance her social and financial standing.

programme.title: Hitch, (2004, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Meet Hitch, New York City's greatest matchmaker. Love is his job and he'll get you the girl of your dreams in just three easy dates, guaranteed!

programme.title: The House Bunny, (2008, Screwball)
programme.desc: When Shelley gets kicked out of the mansion, she's lost in the wilds of Beverly Hills until she stumbles upon the sorriest sorority on campus. Now it's up to her to spruce up the girls and heat up the Zeta house before the University shuts them down.

programme.title: Coneheads, (1993, Science fiction)
programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.title: Instructions Not Included, (2013, Foreign Comedies)
programme.desc: Valentin (Eugenio Derbez) is Acapulco’s resident playboy until his life gets turned upside down when a former fling leaves a baby girl on his doorstep.

programme.title: Planes, Trains and Automobiles, (1987, Screwball)
programme.desc: Neal just wants to fly home to Chicago for Thanksgiving with his family. But all he gets is misery. Misery named Del Griffith — a loud mouthed salesman who leads Neal on a wild goose chase.

programme.title: Jack and Jill, (2011, Screwball)
programme.desc: Jack Sadelstein (Adam Sandler) is successful and has the perfect family, but he dreads one event each year: the annual visit of his twin sister Jill (also Adam Sandler). Things spin out of control when Jill decides to extend her visit, permanently!

programme.title: My Best Friend's Wedding, (1997, Romance)
programme.desc: Commitment-shy Jules Potter reluctantly realizes she is in love with her best friend Michael. There is just one catch: he's about to marry someone else. Jules will do anything to steal him back... except tell him the simple truth.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire, (1996, Drama)
programme.desc: Jerry Maguire is a sports agent who is brought to a point of crisis in his life when he decides to become an honorable man. Follow his journey to redemption through an unlikely alliance with a female accountant, and his least important client.

programme.title: Mona Lisa Smile, (2003, Drama)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts stars as a novice art history professor with a surprising lesson plan that inspires her students to open their eyes to love and life.

programme.title: Autumn In New York, (2000, Drama)
programme.desc: Autumn in New York follows the sexual exploits of Will Keane (RICHARD GERE) until he runs into an unexpected dead end when he meets Charlotte Fielding (WINONA RYDER). Charlotte is half Will's age and twice his match.

programme.title: Much Ado About Nothing, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: Adapted from William Shakespeare, the film tells the story of two couples, confirmed bachelor Benedick and caustic Beatrice, and young Claudio and innocent Hero. Playful bickering defines one couple, whereas romance and betrayal describe the other.

programme.title: Nicholas Nickleby, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: After Nicholas' father dies and leaves the Familyy penniless, the Nickleby Family moves to London to stay with their Uncle Ralph. Ralph turns abusive and separates the family.

programme.title: Elvis And Annabelle, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Anabelle is a small town beauty on the road to being crowned the Miss Texas Rose title, when she tragically dies and on stage due to an eating disorder.

programme.title: A Walk to Remember, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is sentenced to perform community service.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: Only Lovers Left Alive, (2013, Vampires)
programme.desc: Driven by sensual photography, trance-like music, and droll humor, Jim Jarmusch’s ONLY LOVERS LEFT ALIVE is a meditation on art, science, and the mysteries of everlasting love.

programme.title: Let Me In, (2011, Vampires)
programme.desc: Owen, an overlooked and bullied boy, finds love and revenge through Abby (Chloë Grace Moretz of KICK-ASS), a beautiful but peculiar girl who turns out to be a vampire.

programme.title: Kiss Of The Damned, (2012, Vampires)
programme.desc: Beautiful vampire Djuna tries to resist the advances of the handsome, human screenwriter Paolo, but eventually gives in to their passion.

programme.title: Shutter Island, (2010, Thriller)
programme.desc: When U.S. Marshal Teddy Daniels arrives at the asylum for the criminally insane on Shutter Island, he uncovers terrifying truths about the island and finds out some places never let you go.

programme.title: What Lies Beneath, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: The wife of a professor investigates the murder of a beautiful college student who has been appearing to her.

programme.title: Disturbing Behavior, (1998, Thriller)
programme.desc: When the Clark Family moves from Chicago to Cradle Bay, Steve is cautioned by Gavin Strick about the separating factions at the local high school, where the Blue Ribbons, a club of robotic perfect students, rule.

programme.title: When a Stranger Calls, (2006, Teen Screams)
programme.desc: To Jill Johnson, it was the perfect babysitting job. The parents were away. The fridge was stocked. The children were tucked into bed. Rated: PG-13

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: Rain Man, (1988, Drama)
programme.desc: Tom Cruise stars as an idealistic young wheeler-dealer whose life is changed forever when he discovers he has an autistic savant older brother (Dustin Hoffman, in a Best Actor Oscar-winning performance).

programme.title: The Pianist, (2002, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: BEST PICTURE WINNER & 7-TIME OSCAR NOMINEE, THE PIANIST is director Roman Polanski’s most personal movie ever, and stars Oscar winner Adrien Brody in the true-life story of brilliant pianist, Wladyslaw Szpilman.

programme.title: Personal Velocity, (2002, Drama)
programme.desc: Three women's escapes from their afflicted lives. Each struggles to flee from the men who confine their personal freedom.

programme.title: Boyhood, (2014, Drama)
programme.desc: Filmed over twelve years with the same cast, Richard Linklater's acclaimed smash hit is a groundbreaking celebration of life. Stars Ethan Hawke and Patricia Arquette.

programme.title: Good Will Hunting, (1997, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: The hit Oscar-winning drama which launched the careers of Matt Damon and Ben Affleck tells the tale of a headstrong, working-class genius who's failing the lessons of life, until he meets a relatable psychology professor (Robin Williams).

programme.title: The Illusionist, (2019, Thriller)
programme.desc: In turn-of-the-century Vienna, a magician uses his abilities to secure the love of a woman far above his social standing.

programme.title: Meek's Cutoff, (2011, Western)
programme.desc: Settlers traveling through the Oregon desert in 1845 find themselves stranded in harsh conditions.

programme.title: True Grit, (2010, Historical Drama)
programme.desc: True Grit is a powerful story of vengeance and valor set in an unforgiving and unpredictable frontier where justice is simple and mercy is rare.

programme.title: Outlaw Johnny Black, (2023, Comedy)
programme.desc: Hell-bent on avenging the death of his father, Johnny Black vows to gun down Brett Clayton.

programme.title: South of Heaven, West of Hell, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: A small-town marshal, tormented by the puzzling conditions that surround him, is forced to confront his demons at an unexpected and untraditional 'family reunion'.

programme.title: Billy the Kid, (2013, Action)
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter kills a member of an outlaw gang, all Hell breaks loose in this shoot-‘em-up tale of gun smoke and justice in the Old West.

programme.title: Posse, (1993, Western)
programme.desc: There's action galore in this off-beat western that features a group of mostly black infantrymen who return from the Spanish-American War with a cache of gold. The men travel to the West where their leader searches for the men who lynched his father.

programme.title: Cattle Annie And Little Britches, (1981, Action)
programme.desc: Two young aspiring outlaws (Amanda Plummer and Diane Lane) manage to join what’s left of the Doolin-Dalton gang, led by the aging Bill Doolin (Burt Lancaster). The gang’s heyday may be far behind them, but there’s still plenty of adventure left!

programme.title: Alias Jesse James, (1959, Western)
programme.desc: In this hilarious western spoof, insurance broker Milford Farnsworth (Bob Hope) unwittingly sells a life insurance policy worth $100,000 to the infamous Jesse James. Now, he has to figure out how to keep the deadliest outlaw in history alive!

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)
programme.desc: Coraline Jones discovers a secret world that's like her own, but better! When her Other Mother tries to keep her, Coraline must be brave to get home.

programme.title: The Monster Squad, (1987, Monsters)
programme.desc: Young kids form a club that is devoted to monsters, but soon get more than they bargained for when Dracula adjourns to Earth, with Frankenstein's Monster, Wolfman, Mummy, and the Gillman.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Labyrinth, (1986, Fantasy)

programme.title: Coraline, (2009, Fantasy)

programme.title: The Addams Family, (1991, Comedy)

programme.title: Addams Family Values, (1993, Screwball)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: In this visionary film, Will and Jake Grimm dazzle small towns with their imaginative folklore and elaborate illusions, only to discover many of the fantastic characters, and thrilling situations, found in their beloved fairy tales are real.

programme.title: Step Brothers, (2008, Screwball)

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Action)

programme.title: Scream, (1996, Slashers and Serial Killers)

programme.desc: Following her breakout success as the star of a killer clown horror flick, Bowie now finds herself struggling to capitalize on its success. But when she is held hostage by an unhinged fan posing as that same killer clown, horror becomes her reality.

programme.desc: Realizing that they've become part of a real-life version of the Capsule Monsters board game, the gang struggles to find a way out.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Reunited at last, Yugi and his friends rejoice. But their celebration is soon interrupted by a pack of man-eating wolves, a giant turtle, and an angry Genie!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the "Fortress of Fear." Now they have until sunset to find this mysterious structure or they'll be trapped in the world of Capsule Monsters forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests: the Five Sacred Trials. The first of which pits them against enormous sand worms and a mysterious voice that travels with the desert wind.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island, where they face a monster that derives its strength from the sun.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland. To make matters worse, Joey is possessed by an evil force, and destroying it may mean destroying Joey as well.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task: locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five. If they fail to slay these beasts, one of Yugi's friends must give up his soul!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think. These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come. Now Yugi must face the spirit of Alexander the Great in an all-out Capsule Monsters war with the ultimate stakes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: While Eneru continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with god. Zoro’s at the center of the scheme, but he might not survive his mission!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Knock over giant jack! Last hope for escape!

programme.title: Nami’s quick thinking gets Luffy closer to god, and the Straw Hat captain launches himself into the center of a sinister storm! Can he find a way to destroy Eneru’s looming cloud of death?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Miracle on skypiea! The love song heard in the clouds!

programme.title: In the aftermath of Luffy’s epic battle with Eneru, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The battle ends! Proud fantasia echoes far!

programme.title: Robin attempts to decipher the riddle of a mysterious poneglyph, Usopp barters with the locals, and Luffy raids the priceless treasures of the legendary city of gold!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: I made it here! The yarn the poneglyphs spin!

programme.title: With a little help from their new friends – and a giant octopus – the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the deep blue sea. Where they’ll land is anyone’s guess!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Off to the blue sea! A heartfelt finale!

programme.title: After a frightening fall from the clouds, the Straw Hats find themselves trapped inside an impenetrable Marine stronghold. The crew gets separated, the Going Merry is impounded, and rumors of ghosts run rampant!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A state of emergency is issued! A notorious pirate ship has infiltrated!

programme.title: While Nami searches for the Going Merry, Luffy and Sanji pose as famous chefs, only to end up competing in a cooking contest with a beautiful mistress of the galley!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji the cook! Proving his merit at the marine dining hall!

programme.title: Zoro is imprisoned and interrogated, and Chopper’s ill-chosen hiding spot lands him in the operating room along with a doctor who can’t stand the sight of blood!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy’s insatiable appetite betrays his true identity, and yet another member of his crew ends up in the brig when two Straw Hats try to fool Commander Jonathan with the same disguise!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The marine's dragnet closes in! The second member captured!

programme.title: Commander Jonathan sets a Straw Hat trap, but Luffy and Sanji are willing to risk it all to help spring their mates. Will a souvenir from the sky save the day – or will their escape plan be scuttled by foul play?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy and sanji's daring rescue mission!

programme.title: Luffy and his gang make a break for the docks, and Commander Jonathan deploys armed guards in an attempt to slow down the Straw Hats. Only one thing is certain: somebody is going down for the count!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Enter the hot-blooded special forces! Battle on the bridge!

programme.title: The Straw Hats are surrounded, outnumbered, blasted with tear gas. Taking a pretty, young doctor hostage may be their only hope for surviving long enough for a Merry reunion!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Breaking through the seige! The going merry is recovered!

programme.title: Luffy and his crew were almost in the clear when Nami made a horrifying discovery: the Marines stole their gold! Now, the Straw Hats must sail straight into the thick of the fight to reclaim their lost riches!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The pirate ship disappears! Fortress battle, round #2!

programme.title: Usopp hatches a plan for a moonlit raid on the Marine vault, but Commander Jonathan is has a nasty surprise waiting for the pirates! Meanwhile, Sanji and Nami attempt to recover the waver.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The gold and waver recovery operations!

programme.title: The extreme arrogance of a Marine special investigator clears a path for Luffy and company to make their escape! Unfortunately, the Straw Hats still have to find their gold before returning to the high seas!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The one fell swoop plan! Jonathan's surefire secret tactic!

programme.title: The Straw Hats may think they’re in the clear, but Commander Jonathan has one final trap waiting to ground the Going Merry! If Luffy’s crew is to escape, they’ll need a helping hand – or eight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Farewell, marine fortress! The last battle for escape!

programme.title: Luffy and his mates survive and near-death encounter with some mischievous sea monkeys only to land on a mysterious island where everything is much longer than it should be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Great adventure at long ring long land!

programme.title: After a loyal horse and his recently-returned master are assaulted by thugs, Luffy is drawn into a Davy Back Fight with the Foxy Pirates. The Straw Hat captain never backs down from a challenge, but this contest could cost him his crew!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A davy back with the foxy pirates!

programme.title: The Davy Back Fight begins with a treacherous Donut Race around Ling Ring Long Land! The Straw Hats square off against the Foxy Pirates in a battle to see who loses a crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 1! One lap of the donut race!

programme.title: Nami uses her considerable skill as a navigator to put the Straw Hats on the verge of victory, but the captain of the Foxy Pirates has more than a few dirty tricks up his sleeve!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Silver fox foxy! The merciless interference!

programme.title: Thanks to some foxy sabotage, Chopper has been lost to the enemy. The only hope for getting him back lies with Zoro and Sanji, but can they learn to work together in time to save the little reindeer?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Round 2! Shoot it into the groggy ring!

programme.title: Sanji and Zoro take a beating at the hands of the Groggy Monsters, but they won’t give up the fight. With a little luck – and some teamwork – they’ll emerge victorious from round two of the Davy Back Fight!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A barrage of red cards in groggy ring!

programme.title: Round three of the Davy Back Fight is a rip roaring roller derby! Chopper’s fate still hangs in the balance, and the Straw Hats have a huge problem: Luffy doesn’t know how to skate!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Davy Back Fight sprints toward a sensational finish, the Straw Hats find themselves on the brink of defeat! Luffy’s finally managed to stay on his skates, but the Foxy Pirates are notorious cheaters!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A seriously heated race! Into the final round!

programme.title: The Straw Hats somehow manage to defeat the Foxy Pirates and win back Chopper, but Luffy eagerly accepts the challenge of a rematch! What is the captain thinking? And will his crew mutiny?
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A devious game of dodge ball costs the Straw Hats their archaeologist. Now, they’ll have to win an unusual uphill race to reclaim Robin and avoid losing another crew member!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showdown on the cliff! Red light, green light!

programme.title: Robin and Chopper have both been lost to the Foxy Pirates, and there’s only one match remaining in the Davy Back Fight! Luffy’s got a plan to get his mates back, but failure would mean the end of the Straw Hats forever!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The captains square off! The final combat round!

programme.title: Luffy and Captain Foxy go toe-to-toe in a brutal battle waged aboard a booby-trapped boat. Luffy is fighting for his crew, but Captain Foxy’s dirty tricks have him on the ropes!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full-blast slow-slow onslaught vs. Invulnerable luffy

programme.title: Luffy’s epic battle with Captain Foxy reaches its riveting end, and a very old man with a very tall horse reunites with a face from very long ago.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Epic, heated combat! The fateful final conclusion

programme.title: When Luffy and his mates lose their memory, Robin is the only Straw Hat who can remember their adventures together. Can she recover their recollections before the crew splits up?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Was it lost? Stolen? Who are you?

programme.title: Robin tries to hold the crew together while unraveling the mystery of the missing memories. Meanwhile, Nami and Zoro flashback to painful moments from their pasts.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A mysterious boy with a horn and robin's deduction!

programme.title: The Straw Hats finally discover the culprit behind their memory loss, but they’ve got bigger problems. The mysterious thief is determined to pit Zoro and Luffy against each other!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Now, let's get back our memories! The pirate crew lands on the island!

programme.title: Zoro and Luffy fight to the death, Nami attempts to orchestrate an uprising, and Sanji discovers he’s willing to kick a kid in order to get his memories back!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Zoro bares his fangs! A savage animal stands in the way!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Queen Gretchen of the Kingdom of Monaka dies from a car accident. As a fan of her years as a Hollywood actress, Lupin mourns her passing.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Once a year, jewelers from around the country descend on New York City for a jewelry tradeshow, bringing with them their entire inventory. Combined, the jewelry is said to be worth 20 million dollars.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have Pinkerton's unbreakable safe, minus the key. Lupin breaks into the prison where the late Pinkerton was once held and finds the key hidden in his former prison cell. Now the gang has both the safe and key.
programme.sub-title: A Toast to the Con Game

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: At Fujiko's request, Lupin steals the Hina dolls given to the US Vice President by the Deputy Prime Minister of Japan. However, the doll heist was a trap laid out by Fujiko and her partner, Barracuda.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Goemon pities the young boy who is afflicted with an incurable illness and swears to retrieve his father's painting for him. Will Goemon be able to keep his promise and will Lupin decipher the painting's hidden secret?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: The 100-carat blue diamond, known as Hades' Tear is auctioned off at 1 billion dollars along with its accompanying Hades statue to the KL Foundation of Kingsland. Lupin and Jigen make off with Hades' Tear with ease, but they find out it's only glass.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Mexico's richest woman, Madame Tequila owns a black diamond named the Black Pig of Mexico. Realizing that Lupin is after her diamond, Madame Tequila appoints Inspector Zenigata to guard it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 3
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang steal the Ivanov, the Soviet Union's newest atomic submarine from the Port of Arkhangelsk. Lupin becomes entangled in a fierce tug of war between the KGB and CIA when Fujiko decides to sell it to the highest bidder.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #9 Islands of Assasins
programme.desc: The den of the deadly Tarantulas gang, this island is the most dangerous place on Earth… and Lupin's right in the middle of it! A dark mystery haunts his past, and the key to it is on the island.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #10 Tokyo Crisis
programme.desc: When Lupin and his bandit buddies attempt to steal a set of historically significant photographic plates, it turns out they're not the only ones with eyes on the prize in this thievish tale of mayhem and millionaires.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #11 The Columbus Files
programme.desc: Lupin and Fujiko are after the mysterious treasure known only as Columbus' Egg. Fujiko was able to memorize the Egg's location, but when she's attacked and loses her memory, all seems lost. No one else knows where it is. What's a thief to do?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd TVSP #12 Missed by a Dollar
programme.desc: At an auction in New York, attendees are shocked when a mysterious man bids $1,000,000 on a plain diamond ring. The man himself is even more astounded when the President of the World Bank outbids him by a single dollar. The man is Lupin!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Inspector Zenigata arrives in San Marino after receiving a note from Lupin III. Instead of a declaration of a new theft, it's a wedding invitation.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Marlow Brozzi, a soccer player from San Marino. A mafia member has proof that Brozzi is cheating so Brozzi approaches Lupin for help.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Lupin and the gang managed to steal a fragment of Marie Antoinette's necklace, but Jigen has been captured by Nyx.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: A toothache prompts Jigen to rush to a clinic in a ruined town. The doctor, Livia, says she'll only take a look at him if he'll let her hold on to his gun, so he has no choice but to hand it over.
programme.sub-title: With a Gun in My Hand

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Fujiko Mine is seen with the members of a failing circus troupe. A former member of the troupe, Tony Belacastro, known as the Magician, died ten years ago, but the secrets to his magic are written in his "Trick Recipes."

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: The widow Elena is the only one who knows where her late husband hid his fortune. Zenigata shows up to protect her from Lupin's gang, who are out to steal it from her. Zenigata and Elena go to her mountain retreat to hide from Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Nyx, Agent MI6 of the British Secret Service, values his wife and daughters above all others, so he keeps his identity as MI6 a secret from them. However, one of his daughters is kidnapped by some mysterious men.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: An eerie old castle converted to a hotel, known as the "The Mansion of the Cursed Bride," where the ghost of a bride is said to appear. It's said that a priceless treasure rests in the hotel, so Lupin and the gang pay a visit.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd: Part 4
programme.desc: Long ago a dictator was assassinated, and the assassins involved were later killed one by one. Goemon was one of those involved in the assassination. A former bodyguard of the assassinated dictator, the legendary sniper Zora, might be out for revenge...

programme.title: Men in Black, (1997, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Two top secret agents (Will Smith and Tommy Lee Jones) are on a mission of policing alien activities on planet Earth. The Men in Black's current assignment: to stop an intergalactic terrorist from making Earth his next victim.

programme.title: Men in Black II, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agents Jay and Kay are re-teamed against a sinister seductress who represents the toughest challenge yet to the MIB.

programme.title: Men in Black³, (2012, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Agent Jay travels back in time to 1969, where he teams up with a younger version of Agent Kay to stop an evil alien from destroying the future.

programme.title: Cloverfield, (2007, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: Five young New Yorkers face a life or death struggle in order to escape from the city when a monster the size of a skyscraper suddenly appears.

programme.title: Legion, (2010, Action)
programme.desc: When God loses faith in mankind, he sends his Legion of angels to wipe out the human race for the second time. Man's only hope lies in a group of misfits holed up in a desert diner.

programme.title: Overlord, (2018, Action)
programme.desc: Nothing can prepare you for the mind-blowing mayhem that is Overlord. Mega producer J.J. Abrams creates an insanely twisted thrill ride about a team of American troops who come face-to-face with Nazi super-soldiers unlike the world has ever seen.

programme.title: 57 Seconds, (2024, Action)
programme.desc: Josh Hutcherson and Morgan Freeman star in this heart-racing action thriller. Every second counts for a tech blogger who wields a time-altering device to seek revenge on a ruthless corporate empire and ignites a pulse-pounding battle for survival.

programme.title: Attack the Block, (2011, Science fiction)
programme.desc: ATTACK THE BLOCK is a fast, funny, frightening action adventure movie that pits a teen street gang against an invasion of savage alien monsters. It turns a crazy mix of tough street kids into a team of kick ass heroes.

programme.title: War Of The Wildcats, (1943, Western)
programme.desc: A confident oil baron and a determined cowboy are rivals for Oklahoma land and oil rights, and for the love of a pretty schoolteacher. The cowboy acts on behalf of the Indians, on whose land the oil is discovered.

programme.title: Shane, (1953, Western)
programme.desc: A retired gunfighter, now a drifter determined to establish a peaceful life, comes to the aid of a homestead family threatened by a land baron and his hired gun.

programme.title: Red River, (1948, Western)
programme.desc: John Wayne, Montgomery Clift and Walter Brennan give stellar performances in Howard Hawks' epic masterpiece as a self-made cattle baron (Wayne) and his adopted son (Clift) risk everything to drive their herd across the treacherous Chisholm Trail.

programme.title: Hud, (1963, Western)
programme.desc: Hud Bannon (Paul Newman) is the rebellious son of a respectable rancher who’s continually at odds with his aging father. Patricia Neal and Melvyn Douglas co-star, in their Oscar®-winning roles.

programme.title: Silver Canyon, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram are sent by the cavalry to bring in raiders who are interfering with supply lines. Gene traces them to a small Army outpost where the outlaws set out to ravage the town.

programme.title: Valley Of Fire, (1951, Western)
programme.desc: Gene Autry is the new mayor of a lawless town. He has to rid the town of its gambling king and to import a group of gals to settle the men. Gene must out-gun renegades who want to kidnap the gals.

programme.title: The Dark Command, (1940, Western)
programme.desc: A Civil War tale based on the exploits of the notorious outlaw William Quantrill. A courageous sheriff stands up to Quantrill and his band of guerrillas pillaging the countryside in Civil War-torn Kansas, and stops the raids.

programme.title: Wagons East!, (1994, Western)
programme.desc: They came for gold, but now they'll settle for indoor plumbing. John Candy and Richard Lewis star in this hilariously unconventional look at the legendary West.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven, (1960, Western)
programme.desc: Yul Brynner stars as one of seven gunslingers pitted against an army of marauding bandits in this rousing classic that made stars of Steve McQueen, Charles Bronson, and James Coburn. Eli Wallach also stars in this timeless tale of good versus evil.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels, (2000, Action)
programme.desc: When a devious mastermind embroils them in a plot to destroy individual privacy, the Angels, aided by their loyal sidekick Bosley (Bill Murray), set out to bring down the bad guys.

programme.title: Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle, (2003, Action)
programme.desc: The "Angels", three investigative agents (Barrymore, Diaz and Liu) who work for the Charles Townsend Detective Agency, return for another high-octane series of adventures as they investigate the theft of a database of witness protection profiles.

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Ghost World, (2001, Romance)
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.

programme.title: Playing with Fire, (2019, Screwball)
programme.desc: When firefighter Jake Carson (John Cena) and his team (Keegan-Michael Key & John Leguizamo) rescue three siblings in the path of a wildfire, they realize no amount of training could have prepared them for their most challenging job yet -- babysitting.

programme.title: Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back, (2001, Screwball)
programme.desc: The comic "Bluntman and Chronic" is adapted for the big-screen by Hollywood without the permission of the real-life stoner icons of CLERKS— Jay and Silent Bob.

programme.title: Fanboys, (2009, Comedy)
programme.desc: A group of Star Wars fans travel to Skywalker Ranch to steal a copy of 'The Phantom Menace,' so that their terminally ill friend can see it before its release in theaters several months down the line.

programme.title: After a minor success, two members of the group are taken hostage; Carol struggles morally with the lengths she has gone to survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Two separate groups leave Alexandria for supplies, and while both worry over the future of the community, they will face immediate danger.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: When someone goes missing in Alexandria, the community goes on alert, and search parties venture out.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: To save one of their own, Rick's group must venture outside the walls; their experience changes their lives forever.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: As the members of the group remain helpless, Negan takes action that will forever haunt those who survive.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead
programme.sub-title: The Day Will Come When You Won't Be

programme.title: For a number of familiar faces, a new, well-established community seems too good to be true.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A new group of survivors seem to have it all in their impressive community; however, there is a price.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The remaining members of the group try to keep it together in Alexandria; they receive a sobering visit.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Saddled with grief and surrounded by enemies, members of the group try to find safety at the Hilltop before it's too late.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Someone stumbles upon a brand new society unlike anything seen before.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: A deeper look at the Sanctuary and the world of the Saviors; members of Alexandria look for supplies.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Negan's unwelcome visit to Alexandria continues as other members scavenge for supplies; things quickly spin out of control.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Rick and the others are led to a new community, where they meet the residents and their ruler; a familiar face resurfaces.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: While searching for a missing Alexandrian, Rick and his group encounter a mysterious collective, its inhabitants unlike any they have come across.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: An Alexandrian discovers they must navigate the mysterious, confusing and terrifying world within the Saviors' compound.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: The group scavenges for supplies; back in Alexandria, someone must make a morally challenging decision.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Things do not go as planned when a group of Kingdommers delivers goods to the Saviors during a routine supply drop-off.
programme.desc: The Walking Dead

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: An old woman named Mayako lives alone in a mansion. Mayako is very distrustful of strangers, believing they are after her wealth and fortune.
programme.sub-title: The Secret Mansion: A Menu of Love for You

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Reports of Pegasus attacking the town cause Usagi and the other Sailor Guardians to have doubts about whether Pegasus can be trusted or not.
programme.sub-title: Believe in Pegasus: The Four Guardians' Super Transformation

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying their summer vacation by the beach. Shingo is acting as their bodyguard—especially for Ami, whom he has a crush on.

programme.title: Divorce Court

programme.title: Divorce Court

programme.title: The Isiah Factor Uncensored
programme.desc: News anchor and reporter Isiah Carey tackles hot-button news issues with a no-holds-barred attitude.

programme.title: Psicopata Americano II
programme.desc: A história se passa quase 15 anos após os acontecimentos de Psicopata Americano, acompanhando a única sobrevivente de Patrick Bateman. Ela se torna assistente de um professor e começa a desenvolver obsessões assassinas, destruindo quem cruzar seu caminho.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Última Chave
programme.desc: Neste quarto filme da franquia Sobrenatural, a doutora Elise Rainier (Lin Shaye) é chamada para resolver o caso de uma assombração no Novo México, localizada justamente na casa em que ela passou a infância.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: Capítulo 2
programme.desc: A sequência arrapiante de Sobrenatural conta a história da família assombrada Lambert, que procura descobrir o segredo de infância misterioso que a deixou perigosamente ligada ao mundo dos espíritos.

programme.title: Sobrenatural: A Origem
programme.desc: Elise Rainier concorda relutantemente em usar sua habilidade de contatar os mortos para ajudar uma adolescente que se tornou alvo de uma perigosa entidade sobrenatural.

programme.title: O Grito
programme.desc: Karen é uma enfermeira americana que vive em Tóquio e é exposta a uma misteriosa maldição sobrenatural: um espírito vingativo que possui uma pessoa com uma raiva poderosa antes de reivindicar sua vida e se espalhar para outra vítima.

programme.title: O Grito 2
programme.desc: Com Amber Tamblyn e Arielle Kebbel. Em Tóquio, a irmã de uma garota previamente morta por uma maldição maligna é acidentalmente infligida a si mesma. Com a ajuda de um jornalista, ela deve aprender como impedi-lo de uma vez por todas.

programme.title: Nazistas no Centro da Terra
programme.desc: Pesquisadores na Antártica são sequestrados por uma equipe de tropas mascaradas. Eles são arrastados no subsolo para um continente escondido no centro da terra.

programme.title: Ataque do Tubarão Mutante
programme.desc: Um tubarão gigante afunda um barco-escola em alto-mar. Sobreviventes do bizarro desastre refugiam-se em um atol, mas quando a maré começa a subir, o tubarão mutante de duas cabeças ressurge e ninguém está a salvo da fera voraz.

programme.title: Necrotério
programme.desc: Uma brincadeira de estudantes universitários se torna mortal quando descobrem que um diretor de funerária pode ter sido libertado de um manicômio um pouco cedo demais.

programme.title: A Ilha dos Tubarões
programme.desc: Um grupo de completos estranhos se vê isolado por um louco rico em seu complexo na ilha. Eles são forçados a uma luva horripilante, onde devem sobreviver a uma barragem de espécies cada vez mais mortais de tubarão.

programme.title: V/H/S - Viral
programme.desc: Em busca da fama na internet, um grupo de adolescentes começa a filmar fenômenos estranhos. Mas eles não sabem que só conseguirão a atenção desejada quando forem protagonistas de acontecimentos sobrenaturais e sangrentos.

programme.title: Dia dos Mortos
programme.desc: Enquanto o mundo é tomado por zumbis, um grupo de cientistas e militares abrigados em um bunker subterrâneo na Flórida devem determinar como devem lidar com a horda de mortos-vivos e com as diferenças entre os sobreviventes.

programme.title: Dose Dupla
programme.desc: Dois agentes especiais precisam se unir contra um cartel de drogas mexicano depois que uma operação secreta acaba gerando resultados catastróficos.

programme.title: Ruslan-Vingança Explosiva
programme.desc: Ruslan Drachev é um ex-gangster que agora escreve romances criminais baseados em suas experiências. Ao visitar sua família ele descobre que sua filha está casando com o filho de um arqui-inimigo do mundo do crime.

programme.title: Carga Explosiva 3
programme.desc: Frank Martin é obrigado a conduzir Valentina, a filha de Leonid Vasilev, o chefe da Agência de Proteção Ambiental da Ucrânia, de Marselha a Odessa, além de dois sacos de conteúdo suspeito.

programme.title: Redenção
programme.desc: Jason Statham é um veterano de guerra que assume uma nova identidade enquanto tenta se vingar dos assassinos de sua namorada grávida.

programme.title: A Última Fortaleza
programme.desc: Seu serviço ao seu país o tornou um herói. Um erro o tornou prisioneiro. Para o General Eugene Irwin (Redford), é apenas uma questão de cumprir sua sentença, até que ele descobre que seus colegas de cela estão sendo assassinatos.

programme.title: Acima da Lei
programme.desc: Um ex-mafioso que se tornou empresário e um detetive da polícia devem lutar com um ex-policial sujo que quer levar o assassino de seu filho à justiça.

programme.title: Ruas Em Guerra
programme.desc: Quando o implacável Lord Rincon e sua gangue MS-13 recrutam Miguel, de 10 anos, para trabalhar como um de seus entregadores de drogas, Lucas, irmão mais velho de Miguel e que também trabalha para o bandido, está desesperado para manter o garoto seguro.

programme.title: Anjos da Noite
programme.desc: Selene, uma guerreira vampira, está imersa em um conflito entre vampiros e lobisomens, enquanto se apaixona por Michael, um humano que é procurado por lobisomens por razões desconhecidas.

programme.title: Revólver
programme.desc: O jogador Jake Green entra em um jogo com consequências potencialmente mortais.

programme.title: A Vinganca é Minha
programme.desc: Após o ataque a seu complexo, Kane enterra seus amigos e parte para vingar suas mortes. Monte uma nova equipe e siga o caminho através da fronteira para Vancouver.

programme.title: O Franco-Atirador
programme.desc: Depois de uma longa carreira como matador de aluguel, Martin Terrier pretende se aposentar e passar o resto da vida ao lado de sua amada. Mas ele descobre que está sendo traído por pessoas de sua confiança!

programme.title: O Homem da Máfia
programme.desc: Um assalto a um jogo de pôquer ilegal, cujos participantes eram integrantes da máfia, abala o mundo do crime. Um matador profissional é contratado para investigar o caso, mas a hesitação de alguns dos participantes coloca a situação fora de controle.

programme.title: Código Mortal
programme.desc: A problemática policial Billie Palmer comanda uma força-tarefa que tenta impedir uma onda de crimes de um serial killer. Com a ajuda de uma equipe composta por especialistas e religiosos, ela corre contra o tempo e seus conflitos para resolver o caso.

programme.title: Matador de Aluguel
programme.desc: Joe é um detetive, mas também um assassino por encomenda. Quando Chris, um traficante, tem seu estoque roubado pela própria mãe, ele resolve contratar os serviços de 'Killer Joe' para se livrar da morte usando o dinheiro do seguro de vida de sua mãe.

programme.title: Tempo Esgotado
programme.desc: À estação de L.A., o contador Gene mergulha num pesadelo. Dois estranhos separam Watson de sua filha, jogam uma arma na mão dele e propõe uma diabólica troca: matar uma importante candidata político ou nunca mais rever sua filha. A contagem começa...

programme.title: A Arma
programme.desc: Dallas é uma máquina de matar. Seus ataques a gangues de motociclistas e laboratórios de metanfetamina irritam o chefe da máfia de Las Vegas, que sequestra sua namorada. Dallas não irá parar até que a justiça seja feita.

programme.title: Os Suspeitos
programme.desc: Cinco criminosos de carreira são apanhados no enredo labiríntico do filme que envolve um gênio do crime intrigante, raramente visto e quase lendário chamado Keyser Soze.

programme.title: Skyline - A Invasão
programme.desc: Luzes estranhas descem sobre a cidade de Los Angeles, atraindo as pessoas para fora como mariposas para uma chama onde uma força extraterrestre ameaça engolir toda a população humana da face da Terra.

programme.title: Inteligência Artificial - Ascensão das Máquinas
programme.desc: Em uma missão solitária para Alpha Centauri, o astronauta Milutin se une a uma ciborgue chamada Nimani 1345.

programme.title: O Legado de Osiris
programme.desc: Situado no futuro em uma época de colonização interplanetária, um par improvável corre contra uma crise global iminente e é confrontado pelos monstros que vivem dentro de todos nós.

programme.title: Piranha 2
programme.desc: No passado, uma feição geológica nas profundezas da água despertou uma pira que estava extinta há milhões de anos. Depois de atacar o lago em uma cidade tranquila, os terríveis animais invadem um parque aquático no meio da temporada de verão.

programme.title: A Viagem
programme.desc: Uma exploração de como as ações de vidas individuais impactam umas às outras no passado, presente e futuro, como uma alma vai de assassino a herói, e um ato de bondade se espalha ao longo dos séculos para inspirar uma revolução.

programme.title: Sem Perdão
programme.desc: Victor trabalha com um grande criminoso. Um dia, ele encontra Beatrice, vítima de um crime, que pede a ajuda de Victor para ajudá-la em sua vingança. Para convencê-lo a cooperar, ela o chantageira com provas de um assassinato que Victor cometeu.

programme.title: Conspiração Americana
programme.desc: Mary Surratt é a única mulher acusada como cúmplice no julgamento do assassinato de Abraham Lincoln. Enquanto toda a nação se volta contra ela, ela é forçada a confiar em seu advogado relutante para descobrir a verdade e salvar sua vida.

programme.title: Sem Lei
programme.desc: Um grupo de três amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingança contra o antigo parceiro.

programme.title: A Hora do Acerto
programme.desc: Para a Gangue dos 5, tudo é um videogame: matar policiais, armar emboscadas e criar requintes de crueldade. Quem se torna vítima de suas armadilhas é o inspetor de polícia Wing e todo o seu time de policiais, que são brutalmente assassinados.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine está novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avaliá-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e é atraído para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Assassino em Série
programme.desc: Um psicólogo criminal e um especialista em impressões digitais trabalham juntos para rastrear um assassino em série.

programme.title: Kickboxer: A Retaliação
programme.desc: Kurt Sloan prometeu a si mesmo que não voltaria para a Tailândia, mas alguém o seda e o força a retornar ao país asiático.

programme.title: Cão de briga
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma máquina de matar, (Jet Li) é campeão de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Hitman - O Rei dos Assassinos
programme.desc: Um antigo chefe da máfia japonesa suspeita de ser vítima de um ataque e deixa uma recompensa para a pessoa que encontrar o seu assassino.

programme.title: O Justiceiro
programme.desc: Um policial problemático disfarçado deve se infiltrar em uma gangue implacável. Mas as coisas azedam quando outro policial revela seu disfarce e ele rapidamente se vê lutando por sua vida e pela vida de sua família.

programme.title: O Dragão Invencível
programme.desc: Um agente da polícia à paisana procura vingança contra um sindicato do crime implacável após o assassinato do seu parceiro.

programme.title: Três Ladrões e Um Bebê
programme.desc: Para o compulsivo jogador de Slipper (Jackie Chan), existe apenas uma coisa mais aterrorizante do que os credores - o som do choro de um bebê. Mas e se um bebê se transforma-se no salvador de suas dívidas?

programme.title: Missão Quase Impossível
programme.desc: Ex-C.I.A. espião Bob Ho assume sua tarefa mais difícil até hoje: cuidar dos três filhos de sua namorada, que não gostaram muito do namorado de sua mãe.

programme.title: Fora do Rumo
programme.desc: Um detetive de Hong Kong se une a um jogador americano para lutar contra um notório criminoso chinês.

programme.title: Correndo Atrás do Diploma
programme.desc: Shaun espera ansiosamente a resposta de Stanford, sobre seu ingresso na faculdade. Até que, para sua desilusão, é rejeitado. Descobre que houve um engano no envio de suas notas para Stanford.

programme.title: Trocando os Pés
programme.desc: Conta a história de um sapateiro que tem a habilidade peculiar de assumir a vida de seus clientes por meio dos sapatos que conserta.

programme.title: Arrume Um Emprego
programme.desc: Miles Teller, Anna Kendrick e Bryan Cranston estrelam nesta nova e hilária comédia sobre como conseguir um emprego em tempos de economia difícil.

programme.title: Onde está o dinheiro?
programme.desc: Um jovem astuto e inteligente das ruas do sul de Los Angeles precisa entrar em uma comunidade de brancos para recuperar uma grande quantia de dinheiro roubado.

programme.title: Um Pobretão na Casa Branca
programme.desc: Quando Washington precisa desesperadamente de um candidato à presidência semanas antes da eleição, não há tempo a perder. Mays Gilliam (Chris Rock), um político desconhecido de um pequeno bairro de D.C., é escolhido para ser a marionete do governo.

programme.title: Um Homem de Família
programme.desc: Jack Campbell é um solteiro convicto que há 13 anos desistiu de um grande amor para se tornar um empresário bem sucedido. Até que na véspera do Natal ele passa por uma experiência traumática e, ao acordar, vê-se numa nova vida.

programme.title: Tudo acontece em Elizabethtown
programme.desc: Drew Baylor é designer que, em um belo dia, tem sua vida jogada de pernas para o alto. A caminho de Elizabethtow, Drew conhece Claire. Ela é bonita e decidiu acompanhar Drew em sua jornada de volta para casa.

programme.title: Apenas Amigos
programme.desc: Ao visitar sua cidade natal no Natal, um homem fica cara a cara com sua antiga paixão do colégio, de quem ele era o melhor amigo - uma mulher cuja rejeição o transformou em um mulherengo feroz.

programme.title: Nada Melhor que o Natal
programme.desc: É a época do Natal e os membros dispersos da família Rodriguez convergem para a casa de seus pais em Chicago para comemorar. Mas, nenhuma reunião de família ocorre sem conflitos.

programme.title: Ligados pelo Amor
programme.desc: Com Lily Collins. Um aclamado escritor, sua ex-esposa e seus filhos adolescentes chegam a um acordo com as complexidades do amor em todas as suas formas ao longo de um ano tumultuado.

programme.title: O Natal de Heidi
programme.desc: A época do Natal em Nova York é tudo menos maravilhosa para a artista em dificuldades Heidi Neill.

programme.title: À Prova de Fogo
programme.desc: No trabalho o Capitão Caleb vive pelo velho ditado dos bombeiros: Nunca deixe o seu companheiro para trás. Em casa, ele vive pelas próprias regras. Agora Caleb terá o seu trabalho mais árduo, resgatar o coração de sua esposa.

programme.title: O Pretendente
programme.desc: Década de 1920. Após fazer um anúncio prometendo um dote generoso, um pai encontra um marido para sua filha. Será que o casamento arranjado poderá se transformar em amor verdadeiro?

programme.title: Pronta para Amar
programme.desc: Marley Corbett é uma jovem divertida com medo de se entregar completamente a um relacionamento. Ela tenta usar o humor para impedir que os problemas se agravem, mas é pega de surpresa quando descobre que está com uma doença grave.

programme.title: Casamento de Natal
programme.desc: Quando Haley volta para seu vilarejo para ajudar sua irmã a planejar o perfeito casamento de Véspera de Natal, ela é reunida com sua paixão de infância e rapidamente se encontra dividida entre sua nova vida na cidade e o amor de sua vida.

programme.title: Amor pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Peggy (Shannon) é uma alegre secretária que é uma ótima amiga, colega e irmã que vive sozinha com seu querido cachorro, Pencil. Mas uma repentina reviravolta coloca Peggy em um mundo feroz atrás do seu companheiro perfeito.

programme.title: Meu Amor por Grace
programme.desc: Uma história de amor atemporal que se passa no Havaí nos anos 1920, época da segregação racial. Um jovem apaixonado quebrará barreiras sociais em busca de seu amor proibido.

programme.title: Acrescente Amor
programme.desc: April vai à Itália para salvar seu negócio de livros de cozinha quando suas receitas saudáveis são menos que saborosas. Pelo caminho, ela descobre nova alegria e liberdade na vida e na cozinha - e também amor.

programme.title: O Americano Tranquilo
programme.desc: Durante os intensos anos 1950, no Vietnã, um experiente e já idoso repórter britânico disputa com um jovem médico americano, que na verdade é um agente secreto da CIA, os sentimentos de uma bela vietnamita.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Assassino
programme.desc: Com Jessica Chastain, Chloë Grace Moretz e Sam Worthington. Um detetive de Nova York chega a uma pequena cidade do Texas para ajudar na investigação de uma série de assassinatos misteriosos.

programme.title: O Sequestro do Ônibus 657
programme.desc: Um pai não tem meios para pagar o tratamento médico da filha. Como último recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas dão errado, eles são forçados a sequestrar um ônibus da cidade.

programme.title: Um Estranho Chamado Elvis
programme.desc: Um rapaz que vaga pelas estradas americanas após ter perdido a esposa num acidente de automóvel resolve dar carona a um homem que diz ser o próprio Elvis Presley, mas que em nada se parece com o rei do rock. Juntos, passam por uma série de aventuras.

programme.title: Amor, Sexo & Pandemia
programme.desc: Uma visão sobre a epidemia e a solidão em que vivemos. O fato de termos acesso cada vez mais fácil ao sexo sem sexo, temos um problema crescente em construir uma relação de proximidade e amor com outro ser humano.

programme.title: Dreamgirls: Em Busca de um Sonho
programme.desc: Com performances espetaculares de um elenco de estrelas, Dreamgirls faz enorme sucesso com a história incrível de três cantoras que aprendem que tudo é possível quando você segue os seus sonhos.

programme.title: O Irresistível Forasteiro
programme.desc: Um estranho em uma cidade de gado ocidental se comporta com notável autoconfiança, estabelecendo-se como um homem a ser respeitado.

programme.title: Por uns Dólares a Mais
programme.desc: Monco é um astuto caçador de recompensas, que perambula pelas cidades do velho oeste americano em busca de um novo alvo.

programme.title: Colina dos Homens Maus
programme.desc: Um jovem pistoleiro, ferido em uma luta, é escondido e cuidado por artistas de circo. O homem é perseguido por alguns bandidos que querem se apropriar de sua mina de ouro. Quando os bandidos descobrem o esconderijo do pistoleiro, começa uma longa batalha.

programme.title: Rastros de Ódio
programme.desc: O Veterano de Guerra Civil Ethan Edwards chega aos Texas em 1868 e encontra o seu irmão e a família dele.

programme.title: O Ouro de Mackenna
programme.desc: Gregory Peck e Omar Sharif lutam para descobrir um lendário esconderijo de ouro, nesta espetacular aventura no Velho Oeste..

programme.title: Os Dois Super-Tiras em Miami
programme.desc: Doug Bennet e Steve Forrest permaneceram amigos, mesmo depois que Steve deixou o FBI. Mas, para reuni-los, está Garret, um perigoso ex-presidiário em cujo caso os dois policiais trabalharam juntos.

programme.title: Os Jovens Pistoleiros
programme.desc: 1878 no Novo México: John Tunstall recolhe jovens pistoleiros da estrada e os leva para trabalhar em seu rancho, mas também os ensina a ler e a ser civilizados. Porém, ele é uma pedra no sapato do rico fazendeiro Murphy, um concorrente na venda de gado.

programme.title: O Fantasma
programme.desc: A história começa como uma expedição à ilha de Bengalla, buscando as Caveiras de Touganda. Devido à sua enorme energia, elas podem ser desastrosas para a raça humana. Agora, o mal encontrou rival à altura e a aventura ganhou um nome: Fantasma!

programme.title: Era uma vez na China 2
programme.desc: Na sequência do clássico, Wong Fei-Hung enfrenta a seita White Lotus e protege o Dr. Sun Yat Sen, usando o Kung Fu para defender os inocentes na China em crise.

programme.title: Dia dos Namorados Macabro
programme.desc: Há 20 anos, um trágico acidente no Dia dos Namorados matou cinco mineiros quando supervisores abandonaram seus postos para ir a um baile. No aniversário da tragédia, o único sobrevivente volta à cidade em busca de uma vingança sangrenta.

programme.title: A Garota de Rosa-Shocking
programme.desc: Ela é uma colegial que mora no lado errado da cidade. Ele é um galã rico que a convidou para o baile de formatura. Mas tão rápido quanto a relação se intensifica, ela é ameaçada pela dolorosa realidade da pressão dos amigos.

programme.title: Guerreiros do Amanhã - S1E0
programme.desc: Sete jovens saem da cidade para passar um fim de semana inesquecível acampando no meio da natureza selvagem. Na volta, sua cidade já não é a mesma, suas famílias desapareceram, e eles são os únicos capazes de lutar para libertar seu povo.

programme.title: Guerreiros do Amanhã - S1E0
programme.desc: Sete jovens saem da cidade para passar um fim de semana inesquecível acampando no meio da natureza selvagem. Na volta, sua cidade já não é a mesma, suas famílias desapareceram, e eles são os únicos capazes de lutar para libertar seu povo.

programme.title: Em Busca do Paraíso - S1E0
programme.desc: Em um reino de escuridão, um jovem embarca em uma épica jornada em busca da Cidade Celestial depois de ter estranhas visões com uma mulher de branco. Nessa viagem, ele enfrenta diversos perigos e provações apenas com a ajuda de um velho livro.

programme.desc: O fora da lei Zhang sequestra um trem que transporta o governador e vários itens de valor. Quando o trem descarrilha, Zhang tenta se fazer passar pelo governador.
